body_html:
@gorogm Hi , After checkout with previous commit I'm getting the below error

ERROR: /home/lb/ai@work/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/verbs/BUILD:60:1: C++ compilation of rule '//tensorflow/contrib/verbs:grpc_verbs_service' failed (Exit 1)
In file included from ./tensorflow/contrib/verbs/rdma_mgr.h:24:0,
from ./tensorflow/contrib/verbs/grpc_verbs_service.h:22,
from tensorflow/contrib/verbs/grpc_verbs_service.cc:22:
./tensorflow/contrib/verbs/rdma.h:21:30: fatal error: infiniband/verbs.h: No such file or directory
compilation terminated.
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
Use --verbose_failures to see the command lines of failed build steps.
INFO: Elapsed time: 1615.770s, Critical Path: 93.59s
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully

Do you have any idea on this error ?
Thanks and have a nice day

body:
@gorogm  Hi , After checkout with previous commit  I'm getting the below error  

ERROR: /home/lb/ai@work/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/verbs/BUILD:60:1: C++ compilation of rule '//tensorflow/contrib/verbs:grpc_verbs_service' failed (Exit 1)
In file included from ./tensorflow/contrib/verbs/rdma_mgr.h:24:0,
                 from ./tensorflow/contrib/verbs/grpc_verbs_service.h:22,
                 from tensorflow/contrib/verbs/grpc_verbs_service.cc:22:
./tensorflow/contrib/verbs/rdma.h:21:30: fatal error: infiniband/verbs.h: No such file or directory
compilation terminated.
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
Use --verbose_failures to see the command lines of failed build steps.
INFO: Elapsed time: 1615.770s, Critical Path: 93.59s
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully


**Do you have any idea on this error ?**
Thanks and have a nice day
